title: Drawing, "Costume Design: Catherina’s Maids, Pleasures and Palaces", 1965
medium: Opaque watercolor, point of brush and black ink, graphite on gray illustration board
signed: Signed in point of brush and black ink: Freddy / Wittop.
inscribed: Inscribed at upper right: Catherina’s Maids; in graphite at lower right: #36. Verso: inscribed in graphite at upper left: 2 HAND MAIDENS; in point of brush and black ink: PLEASURES AND PALACES.
description: Costume Design: Catherina’s Maids, Pleasures and Palaces

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design: Catherina’s Maids, Pleasures and Palaces", 1965.
1965. Opaque watercolor, point of brush and black ink, graphite on gray illustration board. Gift of Freddy Wittop. 1971-1-3.
